```{r, load-libs, echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr) 
library(tidyr)
library(gt)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(here)
```

```{r, load-table, echo=F, message=F}
# Load table
os_table <- read_csv(here("data", "os_data.csv"))
```


```{r, add-entry, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Add new entries
new_entry <- tibble(
  Authors = "Kentner and Franz", 
  Year = 2019, 
  Title = "No evidence for prosodic effects on the syntactic encoding of complement clauses in German", 
  Journal = "Glossa", 
  `Data available` = 1, 
  `Code available` = 1, 
  Notes = "Example of publishing null findings.", 
  Link = "[article](https://www.glossa-journal.org/article/10.5334/gjgl.565/)  [code](https://doi.org/10.5334/gjgl.565.s1)", 
  Citation = "Kentner, G., & Franz, I. (2019). No evidence for prosodic effects on the syntactic encoding of complement clauses in German. *Glossa: A Journal of General Linguistics*, 4(1), 18. DOI: http://doi.org/10.5334/gjgl.565"
) %>% 
  write_csv(., here("data", "os_data.csv"), append = TRUE)
```


```{r, create-table, echo=F}
# Create GT table (not working w/ github)
os_table %>% 
  select(., Citation, `Data available`, `Code available`, Notes, Link) %>% 
  kable(., format = "markdown") %>% 
  #kable_styling(., position = "center", font_size = 9, 
  #                 bootstrap_options = "striped") %>% 
  {.}
```
